casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Barney Adrian DUNLAP. No. 79P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2015. C. Norman Young, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Barney Adrian Dunlap, Marion, for Dunlap, Barney Adrian. James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of February 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2015."
